mapper.insert: insert into BASKET_PRODUCTS (B_ID , P_ID, PCOUNT) values (#{b_id} , #{p_id} , #{pcount})
mapper.select: select bp.*, p.pname, p.pprice from BASKET b, BASKET_PRODUCTS bp, PRODUCTS p where b.id = bp.b_id and bp.p_id = p.id and b.id = #{b_id} order by bp.id desc
mapper.delete: delete from BASKET_PRODUCTS where B_ID in ( select BP.B_ID from BASKET_PRODUCTS BP INNER JOIN BASKET B ON BP.B_ID = B.ID INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.ID = B.U_ID WHERE U.ID = ${userId} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from BASKET_PRODUCTS where B_ID = #{b_id} and P_ID = #{p_id}
